message: Do I have to remember the last time I checked and then compare with date_created on the message?
@leah oh I think I have enough todo at the moment. mentions can come later.
@leah that's to simple to think up on ypur own :) Thanks for the info.
one more question, is there an API for mentions?

@adsworth currently we're using the unread count from the topic list (api/groups/:group_id/topics.json) to figure out how many unreads there are and just assuming the latest messages are the unread ones
@adsworth not yet. Do you need one soon?
@adsworth okay cool. Just let me know when you need 'em.
